availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Edwin Ruthven Ray (Hickman County Court clerk and attorney)

body.p: Clinton, Hickman County, Kentucky. Hickman County, Kentucky native. Son of Dennis Ray and Nancy Hays Ray. Married to Harriet M. Brown on January 5, 1854. Father of Ruth M. Ray, Susan N. Ray, Annie I. Ray, Willie E. Ray, Edwin D. Ray, Joseph B. Ray, Rachel R. Ray. Attorney in Hickman County in 1860. Clerk of the Hickman County Court in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Town of Clinton, p. 62.
